body: Hi all, I try to create a model to simulate the ventilation effect of solar chimney. Before the step of the running simulation, there is no issue. But the solution contains nothing. And the reminder shows that cannot find probes files under the postprocessing folder. Thanks for your help! [ ](http://api.ning.com:80/files/FSsZCl811bb3-Jh4vefD0KFpTb8kzmT-AhrN4EIj59puM8*df68hJ1LmUgUB4LEsVw5LlPFn-DCzcCSrKi0uI5pH6cO0XYdr/Tan_SOLARCHIMNEY.gh) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/FSsZCl811ba4MWd0HEXXpnRpVkobfpF7OIQOlaXvxjRKeme5yMBIbvqStWgFNjjB6*4fSy7i7oR55-3*Uh-tDGdIWoHVDS-*/model.jpg)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/FSsZCl811bbrVhIR7RdzsQbXinfn0Qe492DkUbRntOofRmqN4ZCvEA9W5Dq9q*TO05zo8C9Lc-hcTGEMNU6B9OcwLzm7Jy-8/algrithm.jpg)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/FSsZCl811bb3-Jh4vefD0KFpTb8kzmT-AhrN4EIj59puM8*df68hJ1LmUgUB4LEsVw5LlPFn-DCzcCSrKi0uI5pH6cO0XYdr/Tan_SOLARCHIMNEY.gh)
topic: Cannot create a postprocessing folder after running the simulation
